name: loopback-component-fixtures
description: Component for handling fixture data for client side tests

scripts.test: npm run cover && npm run assert_coverage_thresholds
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Jonathan Prince <jonathan.prince@gmail.com>
